name: recipetasknodejs
description: curl --location 'http://localhost:8000/recipes' \ --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \ --data '{   "title": "Chicken Biryani",   "ingredients": ["Rice", "Chicken", "Spices"],   "instructions": "Cook rice, marinate chicken, mix and cook.",   "prepTime": 45,   "servings": 4 }'
